name: Ten Days Until She Eats Me
name_original: Ten Days Until She Eats Me
description:
This is a proof-of-concept space station gardening simulator in which you are stuck in an unnamed Rotating Wheel Biological Research Space Station with a strange monster girl.

You wake up with no recollection of what has happened, and your sole company in the Station doesn't seem very interested in letting you know! In fact, she seems more like a danger than an ally...

You will need to grow something for her to eat, or she will just find her own "food", which is obviously not good for you!

Your goal is to survive 10 days until... help arrives!

Explore the little Station! Rotating Wheel Stations use the centripetal force of their spin to emulate earth's gravity, which means there is no "up" or "down" just a long, lonely, quiet hallway!

Thank you for landing on my page, and thank you for playing!
